cnbc.title: Trump threatens China with cooking oil embargo over soybean snub
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump said the U.S. is considering ending its cooking oil trade with China in retaliation for Beijing refusing to buy U.S. soybeans.

cnbc.title: Fed's Powell suggests tightening program could end soon, opens door to rate cuts
cnbc.summary: Fed Chair Jerome Powell on Tuesday said the central bank is nearing a point where it will stop reducing the size of its bond holdings.

cnbc.title: Jeep parent Stellantis announces $13 billion U.S. investment plan

cnbc.title: Jamie Dimon says auto company bankruptcies reveal 'early signs' of excess in corporate lending
cnbc.summary: The bankruptcies have sparked concern about the risks involved when banks like JPMorgan, Jefferies and Fifth Third provide financing for private companies.

cnbc.title: Meta removes Facebook page allegedly used to target ICE agents after pressure from DOJ
cnbc.summary: Meta removed a Facebook group page that was allegedly used to "dox and target" U.S. ICE agents in Chicago after being contacted by Department of Justice.
